story.kicker_image_caption: Shilpa Shinde is all set to make a comeback.
story.storykicker: Shilpa Shinde, the former Angoori Bhabhi, is making her comeback with a web travel show.
story.storybody:
Shilpa Shinde, who shot to fame with her role of Angoori Bhabhi in &TV's Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hai, is now shooting for a travel show for web titled Style in the City. Produced by her close friend Saazish Sidhu, the show will see her as a celebrity guest, who will travel along with 15 contestants, who will basically be teenagers. Ankit Bathla of Thapki fame will also be part of the show.

The show will also take the contestants and celebrity guests to various unexplored destinations in India.

"The show is very different. It is called Style in the City. It's a travel based show and the contestants will be given various tasks," Shilpa told Saas Bahu Aur Betiyaan.

Also read: All guns blazing: Shilpa Shinde lambasts producers of Bhabi Ji Ghar Par Hai in press conference

No looking back

Shilpa has moved on after her bitter split with Bhabiji.... She is now all praise for the new Angoori, played by Shubhangi Atre. "I do watch it sometimes, but I don't miss working in it. I don't have a habit of looking back. At the same time, I would not like to work in a daily soap," she added.

Also read: This is what Shilpa Shinde has to say about Shubhangi Atre's portrayal of Angoori Bhabhi

On Shubhangi Atre playing the new Angoori

"She's doing hardwork. I have a lot of respect for her as an artist. She's playing Angoori in her own way. I would like to wish her the best. Hope people like her. There's no competition with her," Shilpa said.

Here's wishing all the best to Bhabhiji for her new innings.
